wiki-page.author: admin
wiki-page.content: {include-macros:_default.ProjectMacros} #currentIterationVariable($iter) #if(!$request.getParameter("noredirect") && $iter) Loading Iteration: $iter.id <script> window.top.location.assign("/polarion/#/project/$page.project/plan?id=$iter.id"); </script> #else #if($iter) Current Iteration: $iter.id #else #warning("NO CURRENT ITERATION") #end #end
